item.title: Do we have enough Tech translators in place?
item.description:
Do we have enough Tech translators in place?

Right now, AI is everywhere, copilots, smart assistants, agents.

But in most organizations, the real question isn’t: What can AI do? It’s: Who makes sure people can actually use it?

A recent PwC report said over 73% of executives plan to adopt GenAI, but only 14% of workers feel confident using it!

The gap is growing. Not because the tech isn’t smart. But because we’re not designing for usability.
